title.rendered: The Great Nature Theater of Oklahoma is Calling You!

content.rendered: This Friday May 15th at 7:30pm Anthology Film Archives will be screening our film, The Great Nature Theater of Oklahoma is Calling You! — part of their series: Downtown New York Theater – Behind the Scenes — also featuring the work of Elevator Repair Service and The Wooster Group.  The movie was made during an intense month in residence working at the Hebbel HAU 1 Theater in Berlin in the summer of 2013, and will be screened for one night only.  Don’t miss it!

content.rendered:
Tonight is the last night to catch our Midnight Moment in Times Square — and if you missed the festivities — you can check out the video of the Midnight Snack in Times Square on Sept. 20th, here.

photograph by Ka-Man Tse for @TSqArts. Midnight Moment: Nature Theater of Oklahoma, Life and Times – Episode 4.5. September 1 – 30, 2013; 11:57pm – midnight every night. Midnight Moment is a presentation of the Times Square Advertising Coalition (TSAC) and Times Square Arts. This month’s program presented in partnership with Crossing the Line, the French Institute Alliance Française (FIAF).

title.rendered: Life and Times Episode 4.5 has its Midnight Moment

content.rendered:
Midnight Moment: Nature Theater of Oklahoma, Life and Times – Episode 4.5.
September 1 – 30, 2013; 11:57pm – midnight every night.
photograph by Ka-Man Tse for @TSqArts.

Every night in September at 11:57, you can see part of the animated movie that is Life and Times – Episode 4.5 playing on 15 jumbotrons all over Times Square!  For more details click here.  Midnight Moment is a presentation of the Times Square Advertising Coalition (TSAC) and Times Square Arts.  This month’s program presented in partnership with Crossing the Line, the French Institute Alliance Française (FIAF).

title.rendered: Nature Theater of Oklahoma is calling YOU!

content.rendered: Join us in Berlin starting June 28th for BBQ, performances of Romeo and Juliet, Life and Times Episodes 1 – 5, and much much more!  For details go to: berlinerfestspiele.de and hebbel-am-ufer.de

title.rendered: OK Theater is coming to Sweden and the UK

content.rendered: We’re packing our bags for upcoming performances of Life and Times at Göteborgs Dans & Teater Festival and Norfolk and Norwich Festival – where we officially premiere our next installment – Episodes 4.5 & 5.  Hope to see you there!  Follow links for further details.

excerpt.rendered: We’re packing our bags for upcoming performances of Life and Times at Göteborgs Dans & Teater Festival and Norfolk and Norwich Festival – where we officially premiere our next installment – Episodes 4.5 & 5.  Hope to see you there!  Follow links for further details.

title.rendered: Nature Theater visits WNYC – March 3rd at 8pm

content.rendered: Tune in March 3rd  at 8pm to Spinning on Air on WNYC.  We will be talking with host David Garland about Life and Times and singing selections from Episode 1 in studio.  The broadcast will also be available on the web with video.  Check at http://www.wnyc.org/shows/spinning
